init_hook: if [ -n "$BASH_VERSION" ]; then source <(kind completion bash); source <(kubectl completion bash); source <(helm completion bash); complete -F __start_kubectl k; source <(just --completions bash); elif [ -n "$ZSH_VERSION" ]; then source <(kind completion zsh); source <(kubectl completion zsh); source <(helm completion zsh); compdef __start_kubectl k; source <(just --completions zsh); else echo 'Unknown shell'; fi
